channel.title: Creating a Terms of Service
channel.description: I'm trying to create a terms of service for my forum. I have a webhost, I have a domain, and the current forums program I'm using is SMF. Does anyone know how to upload my terms of service page to my website so when they type in my websites URL that's what they're redirected to? I have a regular CPanel.

item.title: Creating a Terms of Service
item.dc:creator: @pkufast pkufast
item.description:
@pkufast wrote:

Ummm, take this up with your web host, not here. This is wrong section as well. I don’t even know what section this falls under. lol.

Read full topic
